summary: This mod replaces vanilla textures of elven weapons with beautiful looking textures inspired by aMidianBorn Book of Silence by CaBaL120. Pack contains vanilla silver and obsidian versions with two resolution (high and medium).
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/27726-1-1354641348.jpg[/img]

This mod replaces vanilla textures of elven weapons with beautiful looking textures inspired by
aMidianBorn Book of Silence by CaBaL120 ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909[/url]). Pack contains vanilla
silver and obsidian versions with two resolution (high and medium).

High resolution textures are the same size as official high texture DLC (2k for weapon, 1k for quiver and 512 for scabbard). There should not be any loss of fps on any PC.

If you like this mod - please ENDORSE :D

[Heading]ABOUT[/Heading]
The Nexus page: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=27726]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=27726[/url]

This mod was created by Erlioniel ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5734721]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5734721[/url]) and is exclusively available on Nexus.

I\'ll be grateful for any kind of feedback, post it in the comments on Nexus. I appreciate any screenshots of this mod that you upload on Nexus. If you have any suggestions on other conversions u can send me PM too.

[youtube]HJ2xSjH-I1g[/youtube][youtube]u_I_bdOm57U[/youtube]

[Heading]CHANGELOG[/Heading]
1.1 Update
	* Added improved meshes for weapons (optional)
	* Remade diffuse textures, made it more contrast
	* New better environmental textures with higher resolution
	* Some fixes for diffuse alpha channel
	* Added medium resolution version

1.0 Release

[Heading]INSTALLATION[/Heading]
I highly recommend installing this mod via NMM, it is easy and fast. U can find NMM here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/[/url]

If u want manual install, just extract this archive and place desired version of textures in main skyrim folder. I do not think there will be any problems with it.

If u want to install obsidian version, install classic (mid or high resolution!) version first, because I cut some files, similar for both versions, for space and traffic economy.

I recommend install aMidianBorn Book of Silence too:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909[/url]

[Heading]KNOWN ISSUES[/Heading]
...

[Heading]COMPATIBILITY[/Heading]
This mod only replaces some textures, so there should not be any problem with this mod.

Anyway, this mode is fully compatible with Basic Crossbow Collection by DJjojo ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23876]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23876[/url]), because that Crossbow is based on vanilla textures. Good job, bro!

Optional (better poly) meshes dont work with another moded meshes (like scabbard for great sword - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5624]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5624[/url])

[Heading]THANKS[/Heading]
- CaBaL120 for inspiration and amazing textures for vanilla armors.
- Nexus Community for great and delicious mods, that makes our game better.
- Bethesda for epic gameplay experience.
- Thank you, for reading and downloading! :D
author: Erlioniel
